text: Hey Saturday nite drunk drivers! Who cares? Everyone dies. Drive through someone. Drive through arbys. You'll die too. No guilt in the void.
Come for the guy out by the drive thru sign who's got fairly okay cocaine. Stay for our Montreal angus portobella sandwich. Arby's: Whatever

Q: How many jr bacon cheddar melts can you eat in one sitting? 

A: it doesn't matter and no one cares.

Arby's: no one is paying attention.
In case there was any doubt... http://t.co/AFxri8qHJE
Arby's: we play john mellencamp in our dining rooms, because fuck it.
Did I die? Eh, it was about the same. Please continue to eat at arbys.
